item.title: Finematics (DeFi)
item.description: Sources: Finematics Note: I’m already familiar with the basics of DeFi (eg. what it is, Uniswap, MetaMask) so there won’t be any notes about those topics. Other topics won’t be as comprehensive. Refer to the Finematics link if you want to start from the beginning, it’s an excellent resource View my project specific posts: Lending and Borrowing One of the most important aspects of any financial system money market: area of traditional finance that specializes in short term lending and borrowing
